title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 08 December 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (08/12/2008 00:11): Design.XWiki Query Language Specification was modified by xwiki:XWiki.amelentev (add list all tags xwql query) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/XWiki+Query+Language+Specification  
xwikibot - (08/12/2008 01:24): FAQ.Howcanisetrighttouserstoedittheirprofileandnotanythingintoxwikispace was modified by XWiki.Sergiu - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/Howcanisetrighttouserstoedittheirprofileandnotanythingintoxwikispace  
dan\_miron - (08/12/2008 09:24): hi  
lucaa - (08/12/2008 09:24): hi dan  
dan\_miron - (08/12/2008 09:29): can someone help me with an issue, pls? i created a new maven module for a wiki2.0 macro, it builds, passes the tests i wrote for it, but when bundled within the platform, the rendering engine doesn't 'see' it. any idea how to fix that?  
xwikibot - (08/12/2008 09:31): XWiki.SachinNS was modified by XWiki.SachinNS (Created user) - http://workspaces.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/SachinNS  
xwikibot - (08/12/2008 09:32): XWiki.SachinNS was modified by XWiki.SachinNS (Created user) - http://workspaces.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/SachinNS  
xwikibot - (08/12/2008 09:32): XWiki.SachinNS was modified by XWiki.SachinNS (Created user) - http://workspaces.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/SachinNS  
asyd - (08/12/2008 10:34): ola there  
asyd - (08/12/2008 10:34): vmassol: http://blog.asyd.net/2008/12/xwiki-mes-retours/  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 10:34): asyd: cool reading  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 10:39): asyd: thanks for the feedback!  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 10:39): asyd: re the developer documentation we're counting on you of course to help us improve it :)  
asyd - (08/12/2008 10:40): ok :)  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 10:40): on my side, I want to do a cleanup/reorg of xwiki.org (as I do almost every year)  
asyd - (08/12/2008 10:40): well, I'll have some freetime in xmas holidays (since I'll be unemployed for 2 weeks)  
asyd - (08/12/2008 10:40): ok  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 10:41): feel free to propose some changes or write some tutorial, or whatever you think would make it better and less messy  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 10:42): asyd: just wanted to say that all points raised are known to the xwiki committers/community so they are being handled/covered. Some may take longer since they're harder to address. Skin is on the way (it's a big piece)  
asyd - (08/12/2008 10:43): ok  
asyd - (08/12/2008 10:43): so, I'm not too far of the reality :)  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 10:51): no you're not too far :)  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 10:52): re the new syntax I'm pretty sure we're blowing any wiki  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 10:52): s/any/any other/  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 10:52): in 1.8 we're going to add support for nested document support so that'll be the final kick  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 10:52): ;)  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 10:53): meaning you can have for example any syntax inside table cell, recursively and as far as you want  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 10:53): same example for lists or any other block element  
asyd - (08/12/2008 11:49): hmm it's not possible to change the logo from the admin's app in 1.6? I can't find the field logon on presentation's panel  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 11:50): asyd: logo is in the skin  
asyd - (08/12/2008 11:51): hmm, the only ref to logo.png I found (using grep)  is on templates/global.vm and print.vm  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 11:54): asyd: go the admin, customize skin and change the logo  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 11:54): or   
vmassol - (08/12/2008 11:54): read the doc  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 11:54): :)  
asyd - (08/12/2008 11:54): ok  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 11:54): http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Skins  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 11:55): oops  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 11:55): wrong url  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 11:55): http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Skins  
asyd - (08/12/2008 11:55): ahh the panel opended by default is the first one, miss the second  
vmassol - (08/12/2008 11:55): http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Skins#HChangingthelogofortheAlbatross2FToucanskins  
xwikibot - (08/12/2008 13:41): Design.DefaultWikiImprovements was modified by xwiki:XWiki.GuillaumeLerouge (I'm currently working on the page, this is a "preventive save" to make sure I don't lose any content along the way) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/DefaultWikiImprovements  
asyd - (08/12/2008 15:14): hmm whats mean "A problem occured while trying to service your request. Please contact the support if this happens again" when I save a class? I have no log in catalina.out  
asyd - (08/12/2008 15:16): hmm it works a logou/login, strange
